alert.note: Alert for Boone; Northwest Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Raleigh, northeastern Wyoming and southern Boone Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oceana, or 9 miles north of Pineville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oceana, Sophia, Dry Creek, Crab Orchard, Bradley, Lester, Kopperston, Glen Daniel, Bolt and Arnett. This includes West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 48 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
